title: Bacteria play a central biological role 1

content.question: Bacteria may act as producers parasites mutualistic symbionts decomposers Select THREE of the ecological roles above. For each one you choose, describe how bacteria carry out the role and discuss its ecological importance.

frqParts.text: Bacteria may act as producers parasites mutualistic symbionts decomposers Select THREE of the ecological roles above. For each one you choose, describe how bacteria carry out the role and discuss its ecological importance.
